doc:
Donald Wolfit https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Wolfit 0 Sir Donald Wolfit, CBE (20 April 1902 – 17 February 1968) was an English actor-manager, known for his touring wartime productions of Shakespeare. He was especially renowned for his portrayal of King Lear. Sir_Donald_Wolfit , CBE ( 20_April_1902 – 17_February_1968 ) was an_English_actor-manager , known for his_touring_wartime_productions of Shakespeare . He was_especially_renowned for his_portrayal of King_Lear .
